summary:
Driven by a passion for technology & its value, my experiences encompass electrical, electronics and information systems development and technical sales across several industries.

Leveraging such a background, I am currently focused on delivering the optimal digital solutions to designers, helping them to develop more effectively innovative products.

Lived in Burundi (17.5 yrs: Bujumbura); Italy (16 yrs: Firenze); Germany (0.5 yr: Saarbrücken); Netherlands (4+ yrs: Utrecht & Eindhoven) - Italian ('85) & Burundian ('01) citizen.

Experience with Oil & Gas, Aviation, Computer Software, Electronics and Semiconductors industries.
My motos: "Do the right thing, the right way" and keep learning.

school.name: Ecole Autonome à programmes Belges de Bujumbura

projects.title: Bearings loading test rig
projects.description: Conceptual design of a novel bearings loading test rig aimed at validating bearings NTIs. Investigated on modeling methods of EM coupling between power (variable speed drive system) and signals cabling systems to predict potential interference issues.

projects.title: GE Aviation’s Catalyst (Prague, Czech Rep.)
projects.description: Led special instrumentation design and global technical reviews of FETT with design and testing teams (Czech Rep., Poland, USA, Canada), contributing to >4 M€ rebilling project and customer satisfaction.

projects.title: Gas Turbine embedded SAW sensors
projects.description: Collaborated with University of Florence to investigate into SAW sensors high frequency numerical modeling for accuracy control of temperature measurements.

projects.title: LM9000: 65 MW aeroderivative gas turbine
projects.description: Contributed to conceptual instrumentation design and test rigs erection, data acquisition architecture and control system design by technical and HAZOP reviews.

projects.title: Cross'd
projects.description: Social networking app PoC based on Bluetooth Low Energy ranging. PoC with Apache Cordova and an AWS EC2 instance

contributors.headline: Product & Technology Management | Aerospace professional | Innovation | Startups
Lead Design Engineer | Executive Ph.D. Student

projects.title: BLE Asset Tracking
projects.description: Sub 5$/Unit PoC of BLE tags (CC2640) with firmware optimized for long-battery life, aimed at asset tracking and inventory management

projects.title: GE Power slip-ring digital telemetry
projects.description: Ran Ansys HFSS simulations to optimize signal integrity over slip-ring connections (power supply and ethernet transmission lines) while shrinking the rings spacing hence manufacturing costs: 3 weeks-FTE rebilling and customer satisfaction

projects.title: Wet gas compressors at KLAB (Haugesund, Norway)
projects.description: Designed and procured validation equipment for ATEX zone 1 test bench. Developed Ex-d antenna and low noise amplifier system for GPS synchronization on NI's PXI systems. Managed IEC 60079-11 simple apparatus compliance on load cells upon using extremely low voltage (1.5 V) Ex-ia Wheatstone bridge conditioners.

projects.title: Power density compressor
projects.description:
Led the commissioning Fieldbus Foundation use in testing lab for more than 240 pressure transducers upon identifing the proper Firmware configuration which enabled for massive and accurate pressure measurements.
Managed capacitive vibration probes ATEX-compliance. Developed electrostatic numerical model to predict capacitance variation in various surroundings and target shape conditions. Contributed to DM37/08 compliance of the test rig contract specification, including power and signaling cabling selection and proper installation.

projects.title: SNC1-2 steam turbine performance evaluation in 6.2 MW cogeneration plant
projects.description: Defined novel pressure hookups method at lower cost and better performance to achieve accuracy controlled inter-stage enthalpy measurements according to ASME PTC 19.11. Programmed a CAN to Modbus TCP embedded module to enable static torque measurements on a MagCanica telemetry.

projects.title: GE-6G PowerGen Module Structural Vibrations Monitoring System
projects.description: Project involving ATEX-compliant distributed acquisition system for more than 150 vibration measurement points, with 40 kHz analog bandwidth, WiFi5 backhaul to storage and real-time monitoring, GPS or daisy-chain clock distro synchronization + TSN investigation, characterized of 3D models & BOM detailed design re-insourcing for timely delivery and cost optimization of certified equipment in less than 4 months (vs typ. 8 months). This also led to the introduction and consolidation of a software based velocity and displacement real-time computation from accelerometers, achieving direct $150k savings on an overall $320k budget, and subsequent lab processes OPEX improvements. Customer value delivered as onsite Turbomachinery Modules structural commissioning.

projects.title: NovaLT16 gas turbine, bearings and cooling component tests
projects.description: Design and validation of smartbox (field datalogger) for analog signals. Defined the first EMC-aware measurement loops design to achieve noise immunity and enhanced measurement accuracies, rigorously applying EN 61000 guidelines (CENELEC 25).

projects.title: GE Aviation’s GE9X HPC
projects.description: High density data acquisition system design for GE Aviation’s compressor test in Massa. Performed mitigation on EMC noise due to 130 kW variable speed ventilation system

projects.title: BCL306 and BCL317 centrifugal compressors rotordynamics
projects.description: Performed an Ex-p execution of stability’s magnetic exciter, contributed to the resolution of customer’s opened nonconformity on rotordynamic vibrations upon conducting an electromagnetic interference RCA.

projects.title: Finite Element Software (FES)
projects.description: FES is an open source C++ framework for the development of "ad-hoc" simulation software aimed at a rapid implementation of novel numerical methods based on the Galerkin method. Core formulations validated reusing meshes from commercial packages (Comsol, HFSS)

projects.title: Spectral domain FEM model order redution
projects.description: Developed in Matlab efficient near-to-far-fields formulations for fast electromagnetic radiation computation in large finite elements problems exploiting model order reduction with spectral interpolation for beam steering and pattern angles. Modeled a large patch antenna array, assessing accuracy and performances through mesh/model export from Ansoft HFSS v11

projects.title: RS-232 modem in ISM 868 MHz band
projects.description: Designed and prototyped an 868 MHz wireless link for a ground penetration radar remote control over RS-232 protocol. C-coded the PIC microcontroller FW and optimized in Assembly to garantee the full-duplex operation over half-duplex TI’s CC1100 radio. Evaluated open field test area performances

Fiber-Optic Liquid Level Sensing by Temperature Profiling with an FBG Array

profile_positions.description: Qualification and incorporation of effective electromagnetic simulation flows for analog/RF SoCs development.
profile_positions.title: Sr. Engineer - Design Enablement

profile_positions.description: Drove key customers' satisfaction upon bringing multi-disciplinary technical support, and by the management of global programmes of work involving the whole Ansys portfolio & ecosystem.
profile_positions.title: Technical Account Manager

profile_positions.description: Executed on presales activities to designers and managers dealing with electronic systems across several industries, and provided support to existing customer base across EMEA.
profile_positions.title: Sr. Applications Engineer

profile_positions.description: Executed on O&G (and AV cross-P&L projects) turbomachinery NPI validation activities from electrical, instrumentation and controls perspectives, from conceptual design to requisition and commissioning.
profile_positions.title: Lead Engineer - Testing

profile_positions.description: Started a UniFi/CSAVRI spin-off, namely “ElectroSoft”, building up on a business model aimed at enabling industry customers with efficient numerical codes to tackle ad-hoc conceptual design problems, e.g. fast em prediction of radome impact on antennas performance.
profile_positions.title: Co-Founder

profile_positions.description: Developed high-frequency electromagnetics codes to investigate on domain decomposition and nonlinear formulations.
profile_positions.title: Doctoral Researcher

profile_positions.description: Implemented a model order reduction formulation in the finite element analysis of antenna arrays for fast and accurate beamforming.
profile_positions.title: Visiting Researcher

profile_positions.description: Implemented a wireless connectivity for a battery-powered avalanche rescue ground penetrating radar (vital signals detection).
